title: Product Lister
job_overview:
Dear applicant,

For our dropshipping business we are looking forward to hitting 7 figures this year. Therefore we are looking for a highly developed Shopify Lister with experience in Dropshipping in Shopify to be part of a new team in our organization, this is for a long term application!

You must understand the whole process and must be highly developed in communication. Therefore, please apply by typing the word strawberry before you introduce yourself. Read on to find out what tasks we expect you to perform, as well as the experience we feel is necessary for this job.

Please answer the following questions, if you are interested.

- Do you have experience working with Shopify?
- Do you have experience with preparing products so that they are ready to be advertised?
- Do you have experience in Google Sheets?
- Have you ever used Slack for communication?
- Are you available for a minimum of 2 hours a day, 7 days a week?

As a Shopify Lister you have:

- Experience in Shopify (Must!)
- Good communication skills (Must!)
- Experience with Facebook Ad Library (pre)
- Experience with product research (pre)
- Experience with workflows (must)
- Experience with different communication platforms (Slack)

If you do not meet the requirements, do not apply. (thank you)

Your duties will be:

- Preparing products and collections in the process to launch on our social media platforms. (5 products per day, 1 collection)
- Communicating with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers who participate in the same process
- Being aware of the process and making sure there are no delays.
- Updating the Google sheet with all products and following the instructions given.

Salary:
- $3 a hour

WORKFLOW IS PROVIDED THROUGH EVERY STEP OF THE PROCESS.
WE OFFER CAREER OPPORTUNITIES IN THE TEAM TO HARD WORKING TEAUpgrade to see actual infoMBERS

If you think you are the right person for this job and you are able to contribute to our company, please respond to this post.

Best regards,

Dyllan
